name: PAC V2
description: This is by far the best recipe I have made! Let me know how I can improve and if it's as good to you as it is to me. Reviews are always welcome!
author: YourMainMatt

reviews.text: Yup. Its a banger.  See below comments for exactly how I feel.

Wow that's some tasty juice right there! All the fruits work together so very well. It's a bit astringent but that's to be expected with Pear & Fuji. It's absolutely packed with flavor. Fairly simple recipe but it has quite a bit of complexity. Well done sir.
Extremely tasty stuff. I've thought about playing around with the percentages, but that's because I can't leave well enough alone, not because it needs to be fixed.
